name: YALE EASY FIT PREMIUM TELECOMMUNICATING ALARM EF-KIT2 - YALE'S EASIEST ALARM YET!!!
description:
Yale Easy Fit Premium Telecommunicating Alarm EF-KIT2

Alarm can be fitted in 3 easy steps. Works straight out the box. 1. Enter the time, phone number and PIN number 2. Just fit the wirefree sensors where you want 3. Test it for peace of mind with our Easiest Testing Facility GO! That’s it! You’re ready to go! The Yale Easy Fit Telecommunicating Alarm will give you ultimate peace of mind by ringing you when triggered. The panel performs all the functions of the standard control panel with the additional features alerting you by telephone should the alarm be activated. The system can also store up to three telephone numbers, such as your home, mobile and work numbers and will call them in pre-designated sequence. The system can also be activated and deactivated using your touch tone telephone. Not only this but the alarm offers additional features such as 868MHz technology and Rolling Code technology. This alarm kit comes with: 1 × Siren Box 2 × PIR 2 × Door contacts 1 × Dummy Siren Box 1 × Telecommunications control panel Features Compact touch screen control panel. 868MHz . Pre linked detectors. Alert up to 3 phone. Armed or part set. Movement detectors protect area 12 x 12m at 90° Angle Pre-linked for super easy DIY installation 40m Range Indoor 868 MHz operating frequency. No hard wiring. Control panel has back up battery too. ***PLEASE NOTE ALL OUR ALARMS AND ACCESSORIES COME WITH A 12 MONTH WARRANTY AND TRACKING INFORMATION SUPPLIED WITH EVERY ORDER***
Pay by PayPal
For Direct Payment Please Call 01922 636033

Yale HSA 6200 Wirefree/ Wireless Standard Alarm System The Yale Standard Alarm is a basic keypad operated system ideal for a flat, terraced, or semi-detached home. The keypad enables you to set or unset the alarm via an access code. The system is pre-set with a 20 second exit/entry period and will allow the entire property to be either armed or disarmed. name: Yale Easy Fit Door/ Window Contact - EF-DC
description:
Yale Easy Fit Door/Window Contact EF-DC Wireless Wirefree 

This accessory activates the alarm system when a door or window has been opened. It is particularly suitable for use in properties with pets or in areas where authorised movement will be required when alarm is armed, eg. Hallway
Activates alarm when door/window is opened

This accessory uses the 868MHz Frequency

Contents
1 Door/ Window contact (batteries included)
Screws and fixings
Instructions


This accessory is not compatible with the old 6000/3000 range alarms.

name: Yale Easy Fit Pet Friendly PIR Movement Detector 3 PACK - EF-3PETPIR
description:
Yale Easy Fit Pet Friendly PIR Movement Detector 3 PACK EF-3PETPIR
This pet friendly PIR activates the alarm system when larger movement is detected. When placed 2m from the ground the detection range 110 degrees with a 12m radius. This unit is ideal for homes with one small pet (less than 20-25kg). Please note that the possibility of false triggering exists due to environmental variations. Larger pets also increase the possibility and frequency of false triggering. In these scenarios please use door/window contacts to secure the area. Features Activates the alarm when movement is detected Ideal for homes with one small pet less than 20-25kg These accessories have been designed to be used with the new range of alarm kits using 868Mhz frequency ***PLEASE NOTE ALL OUR ALARMS AND ACCESSORIES COME WITH A 12 MONTH WARRANTY AND TRACKING INFORMATION SUPPLIED WITH EVERY ORDER***

name: YALE HSA 6010 DOOR/WINDOW CONTACT
description:
YALE HSA 6010 DOOR/WINDOW CONTACT The Yale wireless magnetic contact detectors are for use with all Yale security alarms as they operate on the 433.92 MHz frequency. Use the Yale wireless contact detectors on doors and large windows for immediate point of entry protection. Each detector offers easy wireless installation and registration to the control panel. Each detector can be set to protect an area just at night (home arming) or full time protection when a property is vacant (full arming). This can be set via control panel, remote keypad or keyfob remote controls. These detectors are powered for 2 years by readily available alkaline batteries. The control panel will identify exactly any alarm part with a low battery giving you two to four weeks to replace it. 30m Range Indoor 433.92 MHz operating frequency 1 Door Contact in Each Pack ***PLEASE NOTE ALL OUR ALARMS AND ACCESSORIES COME WITH A 12 MONTH WARRANTY AND TRACKING INFORMATION SUPPLIED WITH EVERY ORDER***

name: YALE CHROME KEYLESS DIGITAL DOOR LOCK YD-01-Y3-CH (NEW)
description:
THIS IS THE LATEST PRODUCT FROM YALE - AMAZING SPECIFICATION AND TOP QUALITY

Do you sometimes wish you could leave your house secure without having to take keys with you? The Yale Keyless Digital Lock brings many of the same advantages, but can be fitted to most timber front doors just like a conventional night latch. Yale Keyless Digital Lock lets you unlock your front door by entering a simple code. No keys, no hassle, no fuss ? just keep a PIN number in your head! You can even create a temporary code to give other people access to your home when you want to, and delete that code just as easily. Features
Touch Screen Keypad The touch screen keypad has no mechanical buttons which means no trace of your secret pincode. 4-12 Digit Pin Code Choose a pin code from 4-12 digits, this could be ideal for children or occupants that lose keys on a regular basis. Fake PIN code Prevent others from identifying your pin code during access, the fake PIN code function confuses the onlookers but at the same time allows you to enter. Low Battery Warning When battery reaches critical level, a warning light will come on reminding you to change the batteries. Insurance approved Use this product in conjunction with the BS3621 mortice lock and make it insurance approved. Low Power Consumption Unlock your door up to 10,000 times with one set of 4 x AA batteries. We recommend the batteries are charged every 12 months. Outdoor Weather Resistant Keypad They keypad is designed to withstand UK weather conditions. Also had IP protection 5,5. User Codes and Setting Remain if Batteries are Replaced The settings and codes will remain programmed in the lock in the even the batteries are depleted. Emergency Battery Connection In the even your battery goes flat you have two battery contact points that fit a standard 9V battery, you can place the battery here and power the lock temporarily to enter your pin. How to Fit Video TRACKING INFORMATION SENT WITH EVERY ORDER
